short_summary: Installation of aluminum fence around Magnetic Observatory
full_summary:
# Aluminum Fence Installation in Nunavut

## Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000074042-A
* **Tender Title:** Aluminum Fence Installation in Baker Lake, Nunavut
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-27 14:00:00

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Notification Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Work Description
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) seeks a contractor to install a perimeter fence around the Magnetic Observatory in Baker Lake, Nunavut. The work will involve installing a 100 feet per side square enclosure perimeter fence with a 10 feet double gate and a 4 feet man gate. All materials used must be non-magnetic and will be supplied by NRCan. Drilling may be required if bedrock is encountered.

## Delivery Schedule
This Contract must be completed by September 30, 2023.

## Resources
The following documents are attached to this tender announcement:
* Dimensions drawing of the Magnetic Observatory site
* Picture of the Magnetic Observatory site
* Invitation to tender (ITT) document
* Amendment 1 to the ITT
* Amendment 2 to the ITT
